attributes.action: urge Stephen Nolan (of Radio Ulster and BBC 5 Live) to take part and successfully complete the 2010 London Marathon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As more and more people become aware of the danger of being overweight>
It's obvious than Stephen Nolan is in a important position where he could influence others to take exercise and contribute to arresting the problem of obesity and lack of exercise within the UK population.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
